name: Cernu Disruptive
description:
Introducing the major players within the ranks of Generatives and Disruptives at Gormenghast.

Cernu Disruptive – A companion to Belatucad Disruptive, she is known to amplify the range of BD’s devastating reach and has many clones of herself, each acting as a bridge or conduit. If a number can encircle an area with effect then they are capable of dissolving an entire army or village of their choosing.

So as to keep Cernu safe, the signal from Belatucad is carried along on what is actually another universe loosely held on her head by a string of spacetime and the contained dark-matter is the pre-amplification of Belatucad’s signal.


PNG 4800 x 4800 || December 12th 2021 || Dark Art digital painting – expanding the Gormenghast origin universe
